definitions: relating to or suggestive of a secret plan made by a group of people to do something unlawful or harmful

examples.text: there are several who think this is some sort of vast conspiratorial plot on the part of the press
historians have rejected this thesis as conspiratorial and simplistic

shortDefinitions: relating to or suggestive of conspiracy

definitions: (of a person’s manner or behavior) suggesting that they share secret knowledge with another person

examples.text: he gave me a sly, conspiratorial wink

shortDefinitions: (of person’s manner) suggesting that they share secret knowledge with another person
